document_data.mainbody:
The Vasty Drink was a large freshwater lake located in northern Gnarhelm on the island of Alaron within the Moonshae Isles.
The lake was found in southcentral Gnarhelm along the foot of the Fairheight Range. The lake was approximately  long from north to south. Along with Salmon Bay, the Vasty Drink separated Gnarhelm into eastern and western halves. The lake flowed northward to empty into Salmon Bay via a small unnamed river. The southeastern corner of Hardangheight bordered the Vasty Drink on its northwest shore.
A moonwell was located in a small forest along the Vasty Drinks southwest shore.
